name: Pedal Palette
details:
analog loop bypass switcher, router, and mixerThe Pedal Palette is the first and only analog loop bypass switcher, router, and mixer capable of swapping effect pedals instantly while simultaneously providing a parallel mix bus. The routing and order of the effects is highly flexible and programmable offering unlimited options to create inspirational new sounds from existing pedals.
https://www.decibel11.com/products_pedal_palette.aspx
